snippet.title: REAVER Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
PLAY FREE DEMO ON STEAM NOW https://linktr.ee/REAVERGAME

REAVER is an ultra-fast-paced FPS that endows you with the mobility and weapon mechanics to reave through arenas of killer machines with grace and efficiency. Push the boundaries of speed and style in this next-gen movement-shooter.
#REAVER

Follow the development, or join us in Discord!
https://linktr.ee/REAVERGAME

Editing & VA by Jenn Endres:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCuwz4i6n-OLC2jzt-RhPlHQ
Music by Dmitry Kardashevsky:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC3r3RSN3laSy1bE9mY0WB5A
Special thanks to Hyze:
https://www.youtube.com/g_hyze
_____________________________________________________________

Reaver is a movement fps, movement shooter, an indie game focusing on movement and weapons mechanics with depth
